thread.title: Video: 'Youth Hostelling with Chris Eubank': Alan Partridge joke becomes real life TV advert
thread.title_full: Video: 'Youth Hostelling with Chris Eubank': Alan Partridge joke becomes real life TV advert - Telegraph

author: Helena Horton , video source Hostelworld
title: Video: 'Youth Hostelling with Chris Eubank': Alan Partridge joke becomes real life TV advert
text: When Alan Partridge, a fictional character in a comedy show of the same name, released his ideas for TV shows, no one thought that any of them would become a reality. One of the weird ideas, which included 'inner city sumo' and 'Partridge amongst the pigeons', was 'Youth hostelling with Chris Eubank'. People kept asking Eubank, who is evidently not a Partridge fan, about youth hostelling. He was very confused by this, until he was taught about the spoof show by company Hostelworld, who filled him in and filmed this funny clip with the dapper 49-year-old ex-boxer. • Black bear lounges in a Vancouver hot tub • Fish spill onto Chinese motorwa y It may not have persuaded Tony Hayers, but perhaps the popularity of the clip will spur a TV executive somewhere to commission a real TV show based on the spoof.
